meta.title: Tripled Vision: Artist's Self-Portrait in Echo by Eliran Bar-On
meta.description: An intriguing self-portrait presenting the artist in a triple composition, exploring themes of identity and self-perception.

openGraph.og:title: Tripled Vision: Artist's Self-Portrait in Echo by Eliran Bar-On
openGraph.og:description: Explore Eliran Bar-On's self-portrait 'Tripled Vision', presenting the artist in a unique triple composition, delving into themes of identity.

structuredData.name: Tripled Vision: Artist's Self-Portrait in Echo
structuredData.description: This self-portrait presents the artist in a triple composition, with a central detailed face flanked by two identical silhouettes, exploring themes of identity and self-perception.
